title: Validate fix with update run
description: Run librarian update in controlled config and confirm no legacy 384 mismatch errors; capture logs.

title: Add tests for multimodal whitelist + ingestion rules
description: Add unit tests for model whitelist validation, strategy selection, and media filtering/dedupe.

title: Update init docs
description: Update README/CONTRIBUTING with init wizard usage and new flags.

title: Wire run tracking for update/reindex and status
description: Track RunOperation across update/reindex, add per-source state in status, ensure runs recorded with operations.

title: Add regression tests for dimension precedence
description: Add tests for config precedence, legacy defaults, Qdrant preflight mismatch/ok, and optional model inference.

title: EPIC: Multimodal indexing
description: Track multimodal config, crawl, relevance, embedding, rerank, tests, docs

title: Task: Config + validation
description: Add multimodal flags to config TOML, defaults off, validation with model capability checks

title: Task: DOM extraction + candidate discovery
description: Identify crawler stage for assets, parse images/picture/srcset, normalize URLs

title: Task: Relevance scoring + dedupe
description: Implement multi-signal scoring and frequency-based dedupe for multimedia assets

title: Task: Fetching + caching
description: Fetch accepted assets with size/type limits; cache by hash

title: Task: Multimodal embedding + doc model
description: Extend doc/segment model for images, wire embedder for multimodal

title: Task: Reranker integration
description: Gate multimodal rerank by model capability; include image candidates when enabled

title: Task: Tests
description: Unit tests for config, relevance scoring, multimodal wiring

title: Task: Docs
description: Document multimodal config, limits, enabling steps

title: Add crawl + dimension regression tests
description: Tests for hash route caps, watchdog triggers, and vector dimension invariants.

title: Add invariant checks and diagnostics
description: Add preflight checks and improved mismatch error messaging (config dim, collection dim, model, sources).

title: Diagnose vector dimension mismatch
description: Trace embedding dimensions and model selection; enforce invariants before Qdrant upsert.

title: Fix update/reindex FK errors and non-interactive logging
description: Resolve FK constraint failures during update/reindex ingestion, ensure non-interactive ingestion paths, and add debug logging to diagnose ingestion

title: Find embedding dimension defaults
description: Locate all sources of embedding dimension defaults and where 384 is introduced or enforced.

title: Implement model-accurate multimodal ingestion + filters
description: Add strategy-specific multimodal ingestion (VL embedding vs dual-encoder) plus main-content media filtering, size/SVG filters, and dedupe.

title: Update docs for multimodal model families
description: Refresh README/CONTRIBUTING/CONVENTIONS with model whitelist, strategy matrix, and citations.

title: Add multimodal model registry + config validation
description: Create model capability registry, add config fields for ingestion/models, and enforce whitelist/late-interaction validation.

title: Fix config precedence for dimension
description: Ensure explicit config dimension always wins; prevent legacy defaults from overriding user config.

title: Trace config to runtime dimension wiring
description: Trace config load to runtime embedding/Qdrant settings and identify where user-configured dimension is lost.

title: Add MCP tools for ingest/update/reindex triggers and status
description: Add async MCP tools for ingest/update/reindex triggers plus richer status reporting.

title: Reproduce update hang
description: Run update with trace logs and capture crawler state leading to SPA/hash hang; collect evidence.

title: Implement config renderer
description: Add TOML renderer that comments defaults/irrelevant fields and preserves ordering.

title: Add init wizard tests
description: Add unit/snapshot tests for renderer and non-interactive behavior.

title: Keep ingest progress bar pinned at bottom
description: Progress bar should stay at bottom even in verbose mode; ensure indicatif output doesn't jump with logging.

title: Design init wizard flow
description: Enumerate config fields/defaults and update init command flow for interactive prompts with conditional logic and non-interactive handling.

title: Dynamic completions for librarian remove source_id
description: Generate completions that list source IDs with metadata for  and output proper shell completion scripts.

title: Fix hash SPA crawl hang
description: Add watchdog/timeouts and cap hash route crawling; ensure renderer waits are bounded and safe.

title: Add Qdrant schema preflight
description: Verify collection vector dimensions before update; provide remediation guidance.
